/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. In the far distance, the faint outline of mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a typical day in this vibrant city.
